name: Mac Font Suitcase
summary: Learn about .FFIL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Mac OS X font suitcase files use "FFIL" as the file type info code. Some FFIL files may have a different file extension such as .DFONT.

description: Collection of fonts used by Mac OS X; stored in a "suitcase" format than may contain multiple bitmap or TrueType fonts; should be stored in the System Fonts or user Fonts folder.
